line.originaltext: 1 (7.5 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts
1 small onion, finely chopped
1 garlic clove, minced
4 eggs, beaten
1/4 cup dry bread crumbs
1/4 teaspoon ground mustard
1/8 teaspoon dried oregano
1/8 teaspoon pepper
1/8 teaspoon hot pepper sauce
2 (8 ounce) packages shredded Cheddar cheese
2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley
Drain artichokes, reserving half of the marinade.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing11, "half of the marinade", ing12, "artichokes", "drain")

line.originaltext: Chop artichokes; set aside.
Chop artichokes; set aside.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic in reserved marinade until tender; set aside.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic in reserved marinade until tender; set aside.
In a skillet, saute onion and garlic in reserved marinade until tender; set aside.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t1, ing15, "sauteed onions", "saute until tender")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the egg, bread crumbs, mustard, oregano, pepper and hot pepper sauce.
In a large bowl, combine the egg, bread crumbs, mustard, oregano, pepper and hot pepper sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7, ing8}, ing16, "spicy crumbs", "")

line.originaltext: In a large bowl, combine the egg, bread crumbs, mustard, oregano, pepper and hot pepper sauce.
Stir in the cheese, parsley, reserved artichokes and onion mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing13, ing15, ing16, ing9}, ing17, "quiche mix", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Fill miniature muffin cups three-fourths full.
Fill miniature muffin cups three-fourths full.
Bake at 325 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until set.
Bake at 325 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until set.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t4, ing18, "quiches", "bake at 325 degrees F for 15-17 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 325 degrees F for 15-17 minutes or until set.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to wire racks.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to wire racks.
Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to wire racks.
Serve warm.
